title: Rich Spirit and N95 (Live Performance on SNL)
lyrics: Ladies and Gentleman, Kendrick Lamar!
Takin' my baby to school, then I pray for her
'Cause you uh ain't never been cool, writin' testament
Paintin' pictures, put me in the Louvre, definite
Universal shift, I'm in a groove
And celebrity do not mean integrity, you fool
Good man, shake your hand, firm grip
Seventy-two wins, lost ten, ballin' with the flu
Two M's for a show, but add another two
Hmm, lil' Man-Man, the big mans
The GT Dyno flippin' the kickstand, mmh
Rich Spirit, broke phone (Ah)
Tryna keep the balance, I'm stayin' strong (Ooh)
Stop playin' with me 'fore I turn you to a song (Yeah)
Stop playin' with me 'fore I turn you to a song (Ooh)
Ayy, lil' lady, attractive (Ah)
Can't play with her no more, she fastin', ugh (Ooh)
Lil' lady, attractive (Ah)
Stevie, Wonder
The morality can wait, feedback on low latency, I'm glitching from the face
Thoughts grow sacredly, I'm runnin' out of space
Ask Whitney, she okay, never mind a hundred K
Why you lyin' on Benjamin? He turnin' in his grave
I'm lyin' if I said I wouldn't give this thing away
The aloof Buddha, Christ with a shooter
Praise to Muhammad, I might, uh, noose ya
AP, Michael Friedman, my friends cooler
Primary, so the resale value stupid
I would never live my life on a computer
IG'll get you life for a chikabooya
More power to ya, love 'em from a distance
Why you always in the mirror more than the, uh
And my reli' tried to sue me like he got the privilege
But I didn't lose sleep 'cause I got the spirit, ayy (Ooh)
Rich Spirit, broke phone (Ah)
Tryna keep the balance, I'm stayin' strong (Ooh)
Stop playin' with me 'fore I turn you to a song (Yeah)
Stop playin' with me 'fore I turn you to a song (Ooh)
Ayy, lil' lady, attractive (Ah)
Can't play with her no more, she fastin', ugh (Ooh)
Lady, attractive (Ah)
Can't play with her no more, she fastin', ugh
Hello, new world, all the boys and girls
I got some true stories to tell
You're back outside, but they still lied
Woah-oh-oh-oh (Yeah)
Take off the foo-foo, take off the clout chase, take off the Wi-Fi
Take off the money phone, take off the car loan, take off the flex and the white lies
Take off the weirdo jewelry, I'ma take ten steps, then I'm taking off top five
Take off them fabricated streams and the microwave meme, it's a real world outside (Take that **** off)
Take off the idols, uh, take off the runway, I take off to Cairo, uh, (Take that **** off)
Take off to Saint-Tropez, five-day stay, take a quarter mill', hell, if I know, uh (Take that **** off)
Take off the front flag, take off perception, take off the cop with the eye patch (Take that **** off)
Take off the unloyal, take off the unsure, take off decisions I lack (Take it off)
Take off the fake deep, take off the fake woke, take off the, "I'm broke, I care" (Take it off)
Take off the gossip, take off the new logic that if I'm rich, I'm rare (Take it off)
Take off the Chanel, take off the Dolce, take off the Birkin bag
(Take it off)
Take all that designer off, what do you have? Huh!
Huh, huh, ugh
You ugly as ****, Peez! (You outta pocket)
Huh, two ATMs (Hah, hah, hah, hah)
You steppin' or what? Riches! (You outta pocket, huh)
Who you think they talk about?
Talk about us— ah! (You outta pocket—shoot, shoot, shoot)
Who you think they copy off? (Brrt, brrt, brrt, brrt)
Copy off us
Servin' up a look (Peez), dancin' in a drought (Fo')
Hello to the big stepper (Peez), never losin' count (Keys)
Ventin' in the safe house (Riches, Ah-huh, Ah-huh, Ah-huh!)
Ventin' in the sa—
Can I vent all my truth? I got nothin' to lose, I got problems to move, I can swim in my faith
Cameras movin' whenever I'm movin', I'm talkin' whatever I make
Money is stackin', the president actin', the government taxin' my funds in the bank
Homies attracting the bread when I'm bracking, my pupils on skates (Hold up, hold up)
Let's think about this for a second (Let's go)
Tell me what you would do for aesthetic (Let's go)
Would you sell your soul on credit? (Let's go)
Would you sell your bro for leverage? (Let's go)
Where the hypocrite at?
What community feel they the only one relevant? (Let's go)
Where the hypocrite at?
What community feel they the only one relevant? Hol' up
Huh, huh, ugh
You outta pocket, yeah, you outta pocket (This **** hard)
You entertain the mediocre, need to stop it (This **** hard)
You entertainin' old friends when they toxic (This **** hard)
What your life like? Bull-uh and gossip (This **** hard)
Tell me what is cancel culture, dawg?
Say what I want about you, uh, I'm like Oprah, dawg
I treat you crackers like I'm Jigga, watch, I own it all

You outta pocket
You outta pocket
You entertain the mediocre, need to stop it
You entertainin' old friends when they toxic
